name: Gonza
text: Huaarrghhh!!!!
Gonza attacked Sakura with all his might.
However, in the spot where the blow had landed, Sakura was nowhere to be seen.

name: Gonza
text: Damn it!! Again!! Where did she go?!!

name: Me
text: (She avoided the attack by diving into her own shadow!!)
The Ninja Art of Taimanin Igawa Sakura was called Shadow Jutsu.
She could hide in the shadows and move from shadow to shadow. A forest with sunlight shining through the trees was the perfect battlefield for her.
And alsoー

name: Gonza
text: !!! Guys!! Get out of the way!!!!
*Woooooosh!!!*
Sharp shadow blades shot out from the shadows here and there.

name: Group of Genin
text: Ugyaaaaaahh!!!!!
Despite Gonza's warning, the shadow blades sliced through his men in an instant.

name: Gonza
text: You planted weapons in the shadows...!!!

name: Gonza
text: Fucking hell!!! You coward!!!
Gonza was using his spear to block the shadow blades and trying to keep Sakura-sensei within his range.
But he was struggling against her as she immediately dove into the shadows.

name: Sakura
text: Wahaha♪ What did you say? Are you ready to tell us about the ghost?

name: Gonza
text: Damn it!!! Don't underestimate me!!!
Being attacked from the shadows beneath his feet, Gonza couldn't do anything with his long spear.

name: Me
text: (Amazing... To be honest, I thought she was riding her sister's coattails... but Igawa Sakura's power is overwhelming.)

name: Me
text: (But this one-sidedness is also due to the match up. Since he's getting attacked from such a short distance, there's no room for him to properly use his spear art.)
It was still nice to see Gonza get beaten in such a lopsided way though.

name: Gonza
text: I get it! Stop!!!
The shadowy attacks finally made Gonza throw in the towel.

name: Gonza
text: It's disgusting how strong these Igawa girls are, even the rumored useless sister.

name: Sakura
text: Who you calling a useless sister!?

name: Me
text: (Well, with the way she usually behaves... I can understand the sentiment.)

name: Sakura
text: Come on then, tell us your ghost story.

name: Gonza
text: Yeah, that. Here's the thing... who's gonna tell you, dumbass!!!
Gonza dove using his Earth Jutsu and quickly disappeared underground.

name: Sakura
text: H-Hey...!!? You could've just told me!!

name: Gonza
text: Remember this, useless sister!!! After I'm done with the ghost woman, I'll definitely kill you!!!
The sound of Gonza's voice coming from beneath our feet was becoming more and more distant.

name: Sakura
text: Aw man, he's gone.

name: Me
text: (Gonza... I thought he was all about attacking.)
A good Taimanin knew when to back off. The fact that he knew when to run away was a sign that he wasn't just a muscle head.

name: Me
text: (The next time they fight, he will definitely come prepared with countermeasures to her Shadow Jutsu. That being said...)
A haunted castle on a rainy night. And the ghost of a beautiful woman.

name: Sakura
text: Hey, hey, Fuma-kun, what do you want to do? Should we try to find the beautiful ghost woman?

name: Me
text: Let's head back for now. I'll ready my squad and return. Looks like things are about to get a little interesting.
We descended back toward the school in the waning sunlight.
